commit.message:
cfglayout.c (fixup_reorder_chain): Handle case where the destination of E_TAKEN is EXIT_BLOCK_PTR.

	* cfglayout.c (fixup_reorder_chain): Handle case where the
	destination of E_TAKEN is EXIT_BLOCK_PTR.

From-SVN: r83179
